metadata.title: CVE-2015-3833 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The getRunningAppProcesses function inservices/core/java/com/android/server/am/ActivityManagerService.java inAndroid before 5.1.1 LMY48I allows attackers to bypass intendedgetRecentTasks restrictions and discover the name of the foregroundapplication via a crafted application, aka internal bug 20034603.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
